widget.convert: { "template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 0), size = (400, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2, color = "Text", color_sel = "TextSelected"), # Timer name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (440, 0), size = (360, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3, color = "InfoChannel", color_sel = "InfoChannelSelected"), # Service name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 25), size = (400, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0, color = "InfoProgramNow", color_sel = "InfoProgramSelected"), # Event name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (440, 25), size = (360, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 4, color = "InfoTimesNow", color_sel = "InfoTimesSelected") # Event time ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 50 }
